attributes.action: ask the BBC to stop employing Kelvin MacKenzie and to stop using him for comment shows.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After MacKenzie's disgraceful comments over the Hillsborough Disaster, we believe that it is distasteful in the extreme for him to be repeatedly interviewed on Newsnight, Question Time etc.

In comparison, his behaviour over the years has been far more offensive than Russell Brand ever war.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
